name: 組織學
restrict: ◎必須先修過【BIU0168  普通生物學甲（一）】、【BIU0169  普通生物學甲（二）】 ◎課程開放上修
goals: Understand the structure of cells and tissues and their corresponding functions
Understand the relationship between structural functions such as cells and tissues and anatomy and physiology, which will become the basis for future study of other courses
Understanding of histological techniques is the basis for future related experimental operations
syllabus:
1.    General methods of histology.

2.    Epithelial tissue

3.    Connective tissue

4.    Cartilage and bone

5.    Adipose tissue and Blood

6.    Muscle tissue & Nervous tissue

7.    Midterm exam

8.    Cardiovascular system

9.    Lymphatic system

10.  Digestive system

11.  Respiratory system

12.  Urinary system

13.  Endocrine system

14.  Reproductive system

15.  Special sense (eye and ear)

16.  Final exam

methodologies.note: 課程講授輔以投影片或影片教學
課堂間問題提問及討論
課程講授輔以投影片或影片教學

grading.note: 選擇題（含整合性選擇題）約40-50題,實得分數乘以所占百分比
選擇題（含整合性選擇題）約40-50題,實得分數乘以所占百分比
參與討論,課堂提問與問題回答

prerequisite: Prerequisite course: 【BIU0168  General Biology A (I)】、【BIU0169  General Biology A (II)】 ◎Available for junior and senior year B.A. program students (Doctoral program courses excepted) and M.A. program students.
